sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,START_TIME ,ENT_TIME ,STATUS ,STATUS_DESC ,SETTLE_CONTENT ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 FROM RESET_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND RESET_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(START_TIME) Like '%'||(#start_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ENT_TIME) Like '%'||(#ent_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS_DESC) Like '%'||(#status_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_CONTENT) Like '%'||(#settle_content:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM RESET_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND RESET_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(START_TIME) Like '%'||(#start_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ENT_TIME) Like '%'||(#ent_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS_DESC) Like '%'||(#status_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_CONTENT) Like '%'||(#settle_content:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
